<ln l="6346" t="8501" r="11117" b="8702" baseLine="8657">
<run underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="800" fontFace="Times New Roman" fontFamily="swiss" fontPitch="variable" spacing="3">

<space/>
<wd l="10886" t="14237" r="11107" b="14323">ac-</wd>
</run>

<nl orig="true"/>
</run>
</ln>

<para l="6394" t="3202" r="10598" b="3403" alignment="left" spaceBefore="144" lsp="exactly" lspExact="199" language="en" styleRef="paraStyle_1_7_60">
